attributes.action: Protect all nursery nurse practitioners, nurseries open for key workers only.
attributes.additional_details: Key workers children in line with all education sectors. Thankyou.
attributes.background: At present under new national lockdown rules all nurseries are still staying open for all children without any thought or protection for the nursery nurse practitioners who cannot socially distance from small children that they nurse and care for each day, to reduce COVID-19 please only open for

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566867
